user.title: Sensors & Switches
user.description: Select the sensors and switches from your EcoFlow system.

data_description.grid_power_sensor: Current grid import (+) / export (−) in watts. Usually from your smart meter or energy monitor (e.g. sensor.smart_meter_power).
data_description.solar_power_sensor: Current solar production in watts (e.g. sensor.powerstream_solar_power or sensor.inverter_pv_power).
data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Battery state of charge in percent (e.g. sensor.delta_2_max_battery_level).
data_description.charge_switch: Switch that enables AC charging of the battery (e.g. switch.delta_2_max_ac_charging).
data_description.discharge_switch: Switch that enables discharge / feed-in from the battery (e.g. switch.delta_2_max_discharge_switch or switch.powerstream_custom_load_enabled).

controls.title: Control Entities
controls.description:
Select the entities that the integration uses to control charging power, feed-in power, and the PowerStream mode.

These are number/select entities provided by your EcoFlow integration.

data_description.power_supply_mode_select: PowerStream power supply priority selector. Must have options 'Prioritize power supply' and 'Prioritize power storage' (e.g. select.powerstream_power_supply_mode). ⚠️ This is NOT the AC timeout select!
data_description.max_charge_power_number: Controls the maximum AC charging speed in watts (e.g. number.delta_2_max_ac_charging_power). The integration adjusts this value to regulate charge speed.
data_description.custom_load_power_number: Controls how many watts are discharged from the battery into your home grid (e.g. number.powerstream_custom_load_power). The integration adjusts this value for feed-in.

data_description.feed_in_mode: Dynamic adjusts feed-in to match consumption. Static uses a fixed value.
data_description.feed_in_static_power: Fixed feed-in power when using static mode.
data_description.min_battery_soc: Stop discharging when battery reaches this SOC.
data_description.max_grid_feed_in_power: Maximum power to feed into the home.
data_description.grid_power_tolerance_discharge: Acceptable grid import while discharging. Higher = less grid import but less battery usage.
data_description.max_grid_import_solar_charge: Maximum grid import allowed during solar charging (0 = pure solar only).
data_description.min_charge_power: Minimum battery charging power (below this, charging is stopped).
data_description.update_interval: How often the manager evaluates and adjusts (seconds).
data_description.deadband: Power deviation threshold before adjusting (prevents oscillation).
data_description.charge_power_step: Step size for charge power adjustments per cycle (hardware constraint).
data_description.min_dwell_time: Minimum time to stay in a state before transitioning (seconds).
